price: 2. un Profeta de Al-lah (Muhammad) que les iba a recitar unas páginas purificadas (libres de toda falsedad)
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
